title: If I miss isha can we join taraweeh with intention of isha?
transcript: if I miss is prayer and I come to the Masjid and I find that the IM is praying the two of the first two so can I join him intending to pray is and when he finishes the two ra and offer Salam I stand up and pray the third and the fourth M ra of of mine the answer is yes this is what you must do you should not join another congregation you should only join the IM f
